snippet.title: Our Freedom - First trailer
snippet.description:
Steam page - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2758190/Our_Freedom/ 

In this game, you play as a guy who has to rebuild a destroyed settlement. You have to build production lines, provide the villagers with food and heat, and protect them! You'll train your soldiers, lead them into battle, either by leading a squad or just watching from the hill.

In addition, the game puts a lot of emphasis not only on urban planning, but also on the RPG component. Trade, create things, exchange, complete quests, and much more!

X - https://x.com/CodeMyGod1
Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/ourfreedomrpg/membership
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/our.freedom.rpg/

Music & bombastic sound effects by Vlad Plotnikov @vldpltnkv
